summary: Jane E. Godfrey was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCAS). She is listed in multiple payroll certification reports from April 1978 to January 1979. These reports detail her name, social security number, position, salary, and employment dates within the SCAS. The documents indicate her continued employment with the committee throughout this period.
significance: Jane E. Godfrey's significance lies in her employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations, indicating her involvement in the investigation, though the specific nature and extent of her role are not detailed in these documents.
